trans-unit.source: Obtaining system information by using the API

seg-source.mrk: Obtaining system information by using the API

target.mrk: Obtaining system information by using the API

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method produces the same information as the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> command.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method produces the same information as the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> command.

target.mrk: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method produces the same information as the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> command.

trans-unit.source: The signature for this method is

seg-source.mrk: The signature for this method is

target.mrk: The signature for this method is

trans-unit.source: NetworkServerControl serverControl = new NetworkServerControl(); String myinfo = serverControl.getSysinfo();

seg-source.mrk: NetworkServerControl serverControl = new NetworkServerControl(); String myinfo = serverControl.getSysinfo();

target.mrk: NetworkServerControl serverControl = new NetworkServerControl(); String myinfo = serverControl.getSysinfo();

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method returns information about the Network Server that is running on the current machine on the default port number (1527).

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method returns information about the Network Server that is running on the current machine on the default port number (1527).

target.mrk: The <codeph>getSysinfo</codeph> method returns information about the Network Server that is running on the current machine on the default port number (1527).
